cards.title: Responsive UI Card
cards.description: A highly responsive and accessible card component built with React and CSS. Designed for modern web layouts.
cards.author: Aakash A

cards.title: API Integration Demo
cards.description: This card showcases a smooth integration with a mock REST API using json-server and Axios in React.
cards.author: Aakash A

cards.title: Card Delete Animation
cards.description: Implements clean CSS-based animation for card deletion to provide a visually smooth user experience.
cards.author: Aakash A

cards.title: Add Card Feature
cards.description: Includes a reusable 'Add Card' component with form state management and conditional rendering logic.
cards.author: Aakash A

cards.title: Design System Ready
cards.description: This card follows a scalable and modular design system approach using BEM and utility-first CSS.
cards.author: Aakash A
